_comments.device_id: Unique identifier for this device. Use a short, descriptive slug (e.g., macbook-air, work-desktop). Must be unique across all devices in your Tailnet. Can also be set via TAILCLIP_DEVICE_ID env var.
_comments.device_name: Human-readable name shown in logs and notifications (e.g., MacBook Air, Work Desktop).
_comments.hub_url: Full URL to the TailClip hub server. Use the hub's Tailscale IP address (100.x.x.x) for secure Tailnet-only communication. Find it with: tailscale ip -4 (on the hub machine). Can also be set via TAILCLIP_HUB_URL env var.
_comments.auth_token: Shared secret for authenticating with the hub. MUST match the hub's auth_token. Can also be set via TAILCLIP_AGENT_AUTH_TOKEN env var.
_comments.enabled: Set to false to temporarily disable clipboard sync without removing the config.
_comments.poll_interval_ms: How often (in milliseconds) to check for local clipboard changes. Lower = faster sync but more CPU. Recommended: 500-2000ms.
_comments.notify_enabled: Show desktop notifications when clipboard content is synced from another device. Set to false for silent operation.
